blocks.name: ixi
blocks.content: ` _i ` times itself is minus 1. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-1999.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 19-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: recextlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ recex . (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 23-May-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm recextlem1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), caddc, co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1)))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adddird(c0, co(ci, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c1), cc))
  subcl(c0, co(ci, cmul, c1))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), caddc, co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  subdid(c0, c0, co(ci, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c0, cmin, co(ci, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, c0), cmin, co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  subdid(co(ci, cmul, c1), c0, co(ci, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c1), cc))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, c0), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, c0)), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcom(c0, co(ci, cmul, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))))
  anidms(wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))))
  eqtrd(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl5req(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1i(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c1), cneg(nat1))
  ixi()
  mulm1d(co(c1, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(ci, cmul, c1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(ci, cc))
  mul4(ci, ci, c1, c1)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1))), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)))), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  npncand(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cc))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c1)), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c1), cc))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  mulcl(ci, c1)
  mulcl(c0, co(ci, cmul, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), cc))
  anidms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1)), cc))
  negcld(co(c1, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), cmin, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cc))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c0)
  anidms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c1, c1)
  subneg(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c1, cmul, c1))
}

blocks.name: recextlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ recex . (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 23-May-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm recextlem2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0)), wne(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1)), nat0))
} = {
  gt0ne0d(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0)))
  3impa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))), wo(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)))
  sylibr(wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0), wo(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))))
  necon3ai(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  syl6eq(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0, co(nat0, caddc, nat0), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  sylan2(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, nat0)), wceq(co(ci, cmul, c1), nat0))
  syl6eq(co(ci, cmul, c1), nat0, co(ci, cmul, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))
  oveq2(c1, nat0, ci, cmul)
  mul01i(ci)
  ax-icn()
  oveq12(c0, nat0, co(ci, cmul, c1), nat0, caddc)
  00id()
  neorian(c0, nat0, c1, nat0)
  jaodan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  syl2an2r(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wne(c0, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  an32s(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  msqgt0(c0)
  msqge0(c1)
  addgtge0(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c1, cmul, c1))
  syl2an2r(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wne(c1, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cr))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c0), cr))
  remulcl(c0, c0)
  anidms(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cr))
  remulcl(c1, c1)
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmul, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  msqge0(c0)
  msqgt0(c1)
  addgegt0(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c1, cmul, c1))
}

blocks.name: recex
blocks.content: Existence of reciprocal of nonzero complex number. (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 22-May-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm recex(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wi(wne(c0, nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  cnre(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cr, cr, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wi(wne(c0, nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wi(wne(c0, nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))))
  3imtr4d(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))))), wne(c0, nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)), wne(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wi(wne(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))))
  syld(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0))
  3expia(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wne(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0))
  recextlem2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0)), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)), wrex(hs2, cr, wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wrex(hs2, cr, wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1)), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cr))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cr))
  anidms(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), cr))
  remulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  anidms(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cr))
  remulcl(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))
  readdcl(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1)))
  ax-rrecex(hs2, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), nat0), wi(wrex(hs2, cr, wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1)), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wi(wrex(hs2, cr, wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1)), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  recn(cv(hs0))
  recn(cv(hs1))
  rexlimdv(hs2, cr, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  syl5(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wi(wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1))), wcel(cv(hs2), cc))
  recn(cv(hs2))
  exp31(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  syl2an2r(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0)), nat1)), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), cc), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2))), nat1))
  sylan(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cc))
  mulcl(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cv(hs2))
  sylan9eq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2))), nat1, co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), nat1))
  eqtr3d(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2))), co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))), cmul, cv(hs2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)))
  mulassd(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cv(hs2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cc))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cc))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)), cc), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  mulcl(ci, cv(hs1))
  subcl(cv(hs0), co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))

  oveq1(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), cmul, cv(s0))

blocks.name: mulcand
blocks.content: Cancellation law for multiplication. Theorem I.7 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

thm mulcand(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

} = {
  impbid1(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, w0, wi(wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  recex(hs0, c0)
  syl5ib(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
  oveq2(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2), cv(hs0), cmul)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c2)), c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c1)), c1, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), cmul, c1), co(nat1, cmul, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), cmul, c1, nat1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  mulassd(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  mulid2d(c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cmul, c2)), c2, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), cmul, c2), co(nat1, cmul, c2), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), cmul, c2, nat1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), nat1, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  mulcomd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  mulassd(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mulid2d(c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(c2, cc))
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, cmul)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))

  eqeq2d(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat0, cmul, c1), nat0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wne(c1, nat0)))

  mul02d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

thm muleqadd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1)))
} = {
  3bitr2rd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), nat1), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1, co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mpanl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  mpanr2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), cmin, co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1)))), wcel(nat1, cc))

  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), nat1)
  mulid1i(nat1)
  oveqan12d(co(c0, cmul, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmul, nat1), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  mulid1(c0)

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  mp3an2(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  addsub(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat1, co(c0, caddc, c1))
  syl5rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), nat1), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), co(nat0, caddc, nat1)))

blocks.name: receu

blocks.origin:
thm receu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wreu(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: msq0i

blocks.name: mul0ori
